org.sadiframework

Interface ServiceDescription

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasURI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceBean

    public interface ServiceDescription
extends HasURI
    An interface providing programmatic access to a SADI service description.
    Author:
    Luke McCarthy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getContactEmail()
      Returns the service contact email address, which may be null.
      String getDescription()
      Returns the service description, which may be null.
      String getInputClassLabel()
      Returns the label of the service's input OWL class.
      String getInputClassURI()
      Returns the URI of the service's input OWL class.
      String getName()
      Returns the service name, which may be null.
      String getOutputClassLabel()
      Returns the label of the service's output OWL class.
      String getOutputClassURI()
      Returns the URI of the service's output OWL class.
      String getParameterClassLabel()
      Returns the label of the service's parameter OWL class, which may be null.
      String getParameterClassURI()
      Returns the URI of the service's parameter OWL class, which may be null.
      Collection<RestrictionBean> getRestrictionBeans() 
      String getServiceProvider()
      Returns the service provider, which may be null.
      String getURI()
      Returns the service URI.
      boolean isAuthoritative()
      Returns true if the service is authoritative and false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • getURI

        String getURI()
        Returns the service URI. A SADI service is identified by a URI that is also an HTTP URL. This URL is used to invoke the service as well as to identify it.
        Specified by:
        getURI in interface HasURI
        Returns:
        the URI of the service

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the service name, which may be null. A SADI service should have a short human-readable name. This is not required, but is encouraged.
        Returns:
        the service name, which may be null

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Returns the service description, which may be null. A SADI service should have a detailed human-readable description. This is not required, but is encouraged.
        Returns:
        the service description, which may be null

      • getServiceProvider

        String getServiceProvider()
        Returns the service provider, which may be null. By convention, this should be the domain name of the institution responsible for the service. This is not required.
        Returns:
        the service provider

      • getContactEmail

        String getContactEmail()
        Returns the service contact email address, which may be null. This is an email address that can be used to contact the service provider in the event that there are problems with the service. This is not required, but is encouraged and may one day be required.
        Returns:
        the service contact email address

      • isAuthoritative

        boolean isAuthoritative()
        Returns true if the service is authoritative and false otherwise. A service is authoritative of its output if it is not wrapping a third-party data source.
        Returns:
        true if the service is authoritative and false otherwise.

      • getInputClassURI

        String getInputClassURI()
        Returns the URI of the service's input OWL class. A SADI service has an input OWL class whose property restrictions describe the data that the service consumes. This is required and the URI must resolve to a definition of the class.
        Returns:
        the URI of the service's input OWL class

      • getInputClassLabel

        String getInputClassLabel()
        Returns the label of the service's input OWL class.
        Returns:
        the label of the service's input OWL class

      • getOutputClassURI

        String getOutputClassURI()
        Returns the URI of the service's output OWL class. A SADI service has an output OWL class whose property restrictions describe the data that the service produces. This is required and the URI must resolve to a definition of the class.
        Returns:
        the URI of the service's output OWL class

      • getOutputClassLabel

        String getOutputClassLabel()
        Returns the label of the service's output OWL class.
        Returns:
        the label of the service's output OWL class

      • getRestrictionBeans

        Collection<RestrictionBean> getRestrictionBeans()
        Returns:
        the restrictions

      • getParameterClassURI

        String getParameterClassURI()
        Returns the URI of the service's parameter OWL class, which may be null. A SADI service can have a parameter OWL class whose property restrictions describe secondary parameters that affect the service's behaviour. This is not require, but if present the URI must resolve to a definition of the class.
        Returns:
        the URI of the service's parameter OWL class

      • getParameterClassLabel

        String getParameterClassLabel()
        Returns the label of the service's parameter OWL class, which may be null.
        Returns:
        the label of the service's parameter OWL class
